Name: Colors! Platform
About the game: Colors! Platform is a minimalist casual platform game. The player must control the cube to reach the portal. With each level the difficulty increases and adds new obstacles and traps. ⮞ 100 Levels ⮞ 100 Achievements ⮞ Intuitive Interface ⮞ Great music
